name: No Modifier
description: Everyone is searching for Leviathan. No Region effect this game.

name: Imprint Alchemy
description: Players start with 3 random Base Imprints.

name: Bulk-Up
description: Start with an additional 30 Drone Health.

name: Punishing Blows
description: Players are dealt an additional 2 Damage if they lose a PvP Round.

name: Teeming Bayou
description: Drone Augments can be rerolled an additional time.

name: Wave Rider
description: Credits from Win/Loss Streaks are tripled.

name: A Different Approach
description: Tier 0 Illuvials cost 1 Credit this match.

name: Legendary Start
description: Players start with a Legendary Augment Crate.
